name: Horizon Health Group, Inc.
description: Horizon Health Group, Inc. is a leading provider of healthcare services and innovative solutions aimed at improving patient outcomes and enhancing the quality of care. Founded in 2010, the company focuses on a broad range of healthcare services, including telemedicine, home health care, and wellness programs. Horizon Health Group leverages cutting-edge technology and data analytics to deliver personalized healthcare solutions that cater to the unique needs of its patients. The organization is committed to promoting health equity and accessibility, ensuring that individuals from all backgrounds have access to quality healthcare services. With a team of experienced healthcare professionals and a patient-centered approach, Horizon Health Group aims to transform the healthcare landscape by integrating advanced technology with compassionate care. In addition to direct patient services, the company is involved in various community health initiatives and partnerships, striving to educate and empower individuals to take charge of their health. Horizon Health Group's mission is to redefine the healthcare experience by providing holistic, accessible, and effective health solutions that foster well-being and prevention.

seo.meta_title: Horizon Health Group, Inc. | Innovative Healthcare Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Horizon Health Group, Inc., a leader in healthcare services providing telemedicine and home health care solutions. Committed to improving patient outcomes and health equity.

faq.question: What services does Horizon Health Group offer?
faq.answer: Horizon Health Group offers telemedicine, home health care, and wellness programs.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Horizon Health Group?
faq.answer: Jessica Lee is the CEO of Horizon Health Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Horizon Health Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Horizon Health Group is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Horizon Health Group founded?
faq.answer: Horizon Health Group was founded in 2010.
